Young Living ClaraDerm Spray (2019 formulation)

Brand: Young Living

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Fractionated Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Myrrh (Commiphora Myrrha) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Lavender (Lavandula Angustifolia) Oil, Frankincense (Boswellia Carterii) Oil, Roman Chamomile (Chamaemelum No

mile (Chamaemelum Nobile) Flower Oil, and Helichrysum (Helichrysum Italicum) Oil.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
